CustomField.description: If this flag is set to true, iPad client will allow Troubleshooting function to be opened from a record. Applies to work order-based Service Flows only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this flag is set to true, iPad client will allow Troubleshooting function to be opened from a record. Applies to work order-based Service Flows only.
CustomField.label: Enable Troubleshooting
